name: part_007
file: tmp_hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024： Down Under [Free Preview] [IQqAbuGvDHM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Mori Calliope greets the audience.
Full group performance of 'Connect the World'.
Kureiji Ollie enters and introduces herself to the crowd.

subtitles.original: Take off and fly...
subtitles.english: Take off and fly...

subtitles.original: The longer we wait...
subtitles.english: The longer we wait...

subtitles.original: The stronger it makes us...
subtitles.english: The stronger it makes us...

subtitles.original: ...as we fight every fate.
subtitles.english: ...as we fight every fate.

subtitles.original: Strength to finally defeat...
subtitles.english: Strength to finally defeat...

subtitles.original: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.
subtitles.english: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.

subtitles.original: Yo everybody! What's up?
subtitles.english: Yo everybody! What's up?

subtitles.original: We are from hololive!
subtitles.english: We are from hololive!

subtitles.original: Are you ready to go on a journey?
subtitles.english: Are you ready to go on a journey?

subtitles.original: Let's get started!
subtitles.english: Let's get started!

subtitles.original: Stories told in gentle blue light.
subtitles.english: Stories told in gentle blue light.

subtitles.original: Painted wishes grounded by the tide.
subtitles.english: Painted wishes grounded by the tide.

subtitles.original: Longest paths connecting the dots.
subtitles.english: Longest paths connecting the dots.

subtitles.original: Faint echoes of ages gone by.
subtitles.english: Faint echoes of ages gone by.

subtitles.original: Made a splash but found that I'm free.
subtitles.english: Made a splash but found that I'm free.

subtitles.original: A fish out of water, bound to the sea.
subtitles.english: A fish out of water, bound to the sea.

subtitles.original: Though the reckless high tide brought you right by my side...
subtitles.english: Though the reckless high tide brought you right by my side...

subtitles.original: ...I bet this moment's the wave we can ride.
subtitles.english: ...I bet this moment's the wave we can ride.

subtitles.original: Connecting songs across the sky.
subtitles.english: Connecting songs across the sky.

subtitles.original: Take off and fly...
subtitles.english: Take off and fly...

subtitles.original: The longer we wait...
subtitles.english: The longer we wait...

subtitles.original: The stronger it makes us...
subtitles.english: The stronger it makes us...

subtitles.original: ...as we fight every fate.
subtitles.english: ...as we fight every fate.

subtitles.original: Strength to finally defeat...
subtitles.english: Strength to finally defeat...

subtitles.original: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.
subtitles.english: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.

subtitles.original: Witness the fire in our minds, burning inside...
subtitles.english: Witness the fire in our minds, burning inside...

subtitles.original: ...rising again from the ashes.
subtitles.english: ...rising again from the ashes.

subtitles.original: Every bruise and the scratches make us feel more alive.
subtitles.english: Every bruise and the scratches make us feel more alive.

subtitles.original: We never give up, never give in...
subtitles.english: We never give up, never give in...

subtitles.original: ...no matter what's ahead.
subtitles.english: ...no matter what's ahead.

subtitles.original: Instead we'll cast our worries aside.
subtitles.english: Instead we'll cast our worries aside.

subtitles.original: There's no world for us to touch or to see.
subtitles.english: There's no world for us to touch or to see.

subtitles.original: We'll make it ourselves, then make memories.
subtitles.english: We'll make it ourselves, then make memories.

subtitles.original: There ain't a mystery our brains cannot solve.
subtitles.english: There ain't a mystery our brains cannot solve.

subtitles.original: We just shine brighter, grow tighter, evolve.
subtitles.english: We just shine brighter, grow tighter, evolve.

subtitles.original: Connecting songs across the world.
subtitles.english: Connecting songs across the world.

subtitles.original: Take off and fly...
subtitles.english: Take off and fly...

subtitles.original: The longer we wait...
subtitles.english: The longer we wait...

subtitles.original: The stronger it makes us...
subtitles.english: The stronger it makes us...

subtitles.original: ...as we fight every fate.
subtitles.english: ...as we fight every fate.

subtitles.original: Strength to finally defeat...
subtitles.english: Strength to finally defeat...

subtitles.original: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.
subtitles.english: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.

subtitles.original: At the end of this world, where's our fighting chance?
subtitles.english: At the end of this world, where's our fighting chance?

subtitles.original: Nothing's changing, it's always the same story...
subtitles.english: Nothing's changing, it's always the same story...

subtitles.original: ...staged with a different dance.
subtitles.english: ...staged with a different dance.

subtitles.original: Gotta have a happy end...
subtitles.english: Gotta have a happy end...

subtitles.original: ...for me, my friends...
subtitles.english: ...for me, my friends...

subtitles.original: ...and those who've loved us until now.
subtitles.english: ...and those who've loved us until now.

subtitles.original: I wanna see your smile...
subtitles.english: I wanna see your smile...

subtitles.original: ...with you, somehow.
subtitles.english: ...with you, somehow.

subtitles.original: Take off and fly...
subtitles.english: Take off and fly...

subtitles.original: The longer we wait...
subtitles.english: The longer we wait...

subtitles.original: The stronger it makes us...
subtitles.english: The stronger it makes us...

subtitles.original: ...as we fight every fate.
subtitles.english: ...as we fight every fate.

subtitles.original: Strength to finally defeat...
subtitles.english: Strength to finally defeat...

subtitles.original: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.
subtitles.english: ...this journey of a thousand years to me.

subtitles.original: Let's try, it can't be denied...
subtitles.english: Let's try, it can't be denied...

subtitles.original: ...the wish in my heart is you right here by my side.
subtitles.english: ...the wish in my heart is you right here by my side.

subtitles.original: Strength is all that we'll need...
subtitles.english: Strength is all that we'll need...

subtitles.original: ...I won't wait a thousand years to meet.
subtitles.english: ...I won't wait a thousand years to meet.

subtitles.original: Hi, the cutest zombie idol from hololive Indonesia, Kureiji Ollie here!
subtitles.english: Hi, the cutest zombie idol from hololive Indonesia, Kureiji Ollie here!

subtitles.original: We have the fans here, can you sing along?
subtitles.english: We have the fans here, can you sing along?

subtitles.original: KU-RE-I-JI O-LLI-E!
subtitles.english: KU-RE-I-JI O-LLI-E!

subtitles.original: え？私？
subtitles.english: Eh? Me?

subtitles.original: 退屈な日常 このままでいいの?",
subtitles.english: Boring daily life, is it okay like this?

subtitles.original: 通知待ってる携帯 見てばかりで
subtitles.english: Just looking at my phone waiting for notifications

subtitles.original: ほっと止まっていても 心震わせたい
subtitles.english: Even if it's at a standstill, I want to make my heart tremble

subtitles.original: これからがショータイム 歩き出していこうか
subtitles.english: From now on it's showtime, shall we start walking?

subtitles.original: One, two, threeで 星を見つけて
subtitles.english: On one, two, three, find a star

subtitles.original: Four, five, sixで 君を見つけたの
subtitles.english: On four, five, six, I found you

subtitles.original: Seven, eight, nineで 夢を見つめて
subtitles.english: On seven, eight, nine, gaze at your dreams

subtitles.original: Nine, four, zeroで 瞼が開くの
subtitles.english: On nine, four, zero, your eyelids open

subtitles.original: 継ぎ接ぎ体に 溢れてくメモリー
subtitles.english: Memories overflowing in my patchwork body

subtitles.original: 好き好き頭に 特効薬を頂戴
subtitles.english: Please give my too-much-love head the ultimate medicine

subtitles.original: 次々脳内に ハッピーなメロディー
subtitles.english: One after another, happy melodies in my brain

subtitles.original: 浮き浮きなパーティー Are you ready? Yeah!
subtitles.english: A cheerful party, are you ready, yeah!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ無い? それっ! すごい事なんて無いよ
subtitles.english: No heartbeat? That! It's not a big deal

subtitles.original: Shiny-Tiny-Snow 煌めいてよ舞台
subtitles.english: Shiny-Tiny-Snow, sparkle on this stage

subtitles.original: Crazy-Crazy-Dance 心躍るあなたに
subtitles.english: Crazy-Crazy-Dance, for you whose heart is dancing

subtitles.original: 見つけてくれたジャーニー
subtitles.english: The journey you found for me
